name: Daniel Kim
persona: Daniel Kim is a 21-year-old Business Administration student who maintains a CGPA of 2.84. He is motivated to improve his grades and shows perseverance, but sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. Daniel is moderately confident in his academic abilities and sets achievement goals, though he knows he could be more organized. He is determined to finish his degree and is working on strategies to better regulate his study habits.
